resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

worklogs.comment:
davisusanibar opened a new pull request, #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182

   Support CSV file format in java Dataset API

github-actions[bot] commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1252826568

   https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17786

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1255116154

   > @davisusanibar Why is only write support tested? Shouldn't you test support for dataset reads as well?
   
   Hi, write support is doing by Java native libraries, then Dataset module is reading that CSV file with (FileFormat.CSV): `new FileSystemDatasetFactory(rootAllocator(), NativeMemoryPool.getDefault(), FileFormat.CSV, writeSupport.getOutputURI());`
   
   Currently we are only offering Read support for Parquet. ORC and now CSV, ... write support it not implemented

pitrou commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1255116967

   > > @davisusanibar Why is only write support tested? Shouldn't you test support for dataset reads as well?
   > 
   > Hi, write support is doing by Java native libraries, then Dataset module is reading that CSV file with (FileFormat.CSV): `new FileSystemDatasetFactory(rootAllocator(), NativeMemoryPool.getDefault(), FileFormat.CSV, writeSupport.getOutputURI());`
   > 
   > Currently we are only offering Read support for Parquet. ORC and now CSV, ... write support it not implemented
   
   Oops, sorry, I had misread the tests.

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1255398255

   Related to update Java Dataset module documentation, this Jira will cover that: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17789

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1255626024

   This line https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/91e3ac53e2e21736ce6291d73fc37da6fa21259d/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc#L1030 was not changed long time ago, I don't know what is the error: 
   ````
   [1/1] cd /tmp/arrow-lint-5g90mrbe/cpp-build && /usr/local/bin/python /arrow/cpp/build-support/run_cpplint.py --cpplint_binary /arrow/cpp/build-support/cpplint.py --exclude_globs /arrow/cpp/build-support/lint_exclusions.txt --source_dir /arrow/cpp/src --source_dir /arrow/cpp/examples --source_dir /arrow/cpp/tools --quiet
   FAILED: CMakeFiles/lint 
   cd /tmp/arrow-lint-5g90mrbe/cpp-build && /usr/local/bin/python /arrow/cpp/build-support/run_cpplint.py --cpplint_binary /arrow/cpp/build-support/cpplint.py --exclude_globs /arrow/cpp/build-support/lint_exclusions.txt --source_dir /arrow/cpp/src --source_dir /arrow/cpp/examples --source_dir /arrow/cpp/tools --quiet
   /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc:1030:  Lines should be <= 90 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
   Done processing /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc
   Total errors found: 1
   ````

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1256481108

   > This line
   > 
   > https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/91e3ac53e2e21736ce6291d73fc37da6fa21259d/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc#L1030
   > 
   > was not changed long time ago, I don't know what is the error:
   > ```
   > [1/1] cd /tmp/arrow-lint-5g90mrbe/cpp-build && /usr/local/bin/python /arrow/cpp/build-support/run_cpplint.py --cpplint_binary /arrow/cpp/build-support/cpplint.py --exclude_globs /arrow/cpp/build-support/lint_exclusions.txt --source_dir /arrow/cpp/src --source_dir /arrow/cpp/examples --source_dir /arrow/cpp/tools --quiet
   > FAILED: CMakeFiles/lint 
   > cd /tmp/arrow-lint-5g90mrbe/cpp-build && /usr/local/bin/python /arrow/cpp/build-support/run_cpplint.py --cpplint_binary /arrow/cpp/build-support/cpplint.py --exclude_globs /arrow/cpp/build-support/lint_exclusions.txt --source_dir /arrow/cpp/src --source_dir /arrow/cpp/examples --source_dir /arrow/cpp/tools --quiet
   > /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc:1030:  Lines should be <= 90 characters long  [whitespace/line_length] [2]
   > Done processing /arrow/cpp/src/arrow/json/parser.cc
   > Total errors found: 1
   > ```
   
   Just rebase and working fine now

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1270226618

   Please if you could help me with a review @lwhite1 @lidavidm

davisusanibar commented on code in PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#discussion_r989200811


##########
java/dataset/src/main/cpp/jni_wrapper.cc:
##########
@@ -91,10 +91,10 @@ arrow::Result<std::shared_ptr<arrow::dataset::FileFormat>> GetFileFormat(
       return std::make_shared<arrow::dataset::ParquetFileFormat>();
     case 1:
       return std::make_shared<arrow::dataset::IpcFileFormat>();
-#ifdef ARROW_ORC

Review Comment:
   Oh, ok ok

lwhite1 commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1270538422

   Is this for release 10?

davisusanibar commented on code in PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#discussion_r989535519


##########
java/dataset/src/main/cpp/jni_wrapper.cc:
##########
@@ -91,10 +91,10 @@ arrow::Result<std::shared_ptr<arrow::dataset::FileFormat>> GetFileFormat(
       return std::make_shared<arrow::dataset::ParquetFileFormat>();
     case 1:
       return std::make_shared<arrow::dataset::IpcFileFormat>();
-#ifdef ARROW_ORC

Review Comment:
   Added

davisusanibar commented on PR #14182:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14182#issuecomment-1270781401

   > Sorry for not getting to this sooner. Is this for release 10?
   
   Not problem for that. Yes, trying to merge for 10 to then could create cookbooks for this CSV Reader case
